Restraints

Binders are simple, single-use, resin-cord restraints that can be placed only on helpless, @Compendium[sfrpg.conditions.XgK4EdO5D3Fj3iWz]{Pinned}, or willing creatures (a standard action). A pair of binders immobilizes two limbs of your choice. A creature can escape binders with a successful Acrobatics check (DC = 20 + 1-1/2 × your level).

Manacles are reusable wrist restraints made of hardened metal or ceramics and keyed to open with a security chip, code, or voice command (determined when they are manufactured). Manacles can be placed only on helpless, @Compendium[sfrpg.conditions.XgK4EdO5D3Fj3iWz]{Pinned}, or willing creatures (a standard action). Manacles prevent two arms from holding or using any object. A creature can escape manacles with a successful DC 30 Acrobatics check.
